title: New Partnership with TechMotors Announced
content: We're excited to announce our new partnership with TechMotors, a leading provider of advanced motor technology. This collaboration will provide our team with cutting-edge components and technical support for our upcoming racing season. Representatives from TechMotors will also conduct workshops for our team members on the latest innovations in motor technology.
summary: TechMotors joins as platinum sponsor, providing advanced motor technology and expertise.
author: Sponsorship Coordinator
